Entries.Sat6: I went to town the other day to buy groceries and Alexis almost hit me with her football!$a#$b#I almost dropped a week's worth of groceries, I was so startled!$a#$b#She said she was sorry though and things went well, so it's fine.$s#$b#She even offered to help me with bringing the groceries back!

Entries.Wed4: I remember little Alexis when she was just a tiny sprout.$h#$e#That kid might make it as a gridball player if she really works at it.#$e#I hope George and Evelyn realize her potential.

Entries.fall_15: I'll bet you Alexis is going to challenge me to the strongman game again, even though I won last year.$h
Alexis and I have this kind of mock rivalry going on where we try to see who's stronger.$6#$b#I'm going to challenge her to the strongman game tomorrow.$6
Entries.Sat4: Sometimes I wonder if Alexis tried to get to know me just to use me as her personal physical therapist... I don't mind too much, though, because we're friends now.

Entries.fall_15: Alexis and I have this kind of mock rivalry going on where we try to see who's stronger.$6#$b#I'm going to challenge her to the strongman game tomorrow.$6
Entries.Sat4: Sometimes I wonder if Alexis tried to get to know me just to use me as her personal physical therapist... I don't mind too much, though, because we're friends now.

Entries.Mon4: I miss hanging out with Alexis and Corine at the beach.#$e#It has always been our safe haven.$h#$e#You're welcome to join us next time if you like, @.

Entries.Kiarra: Irene told me about this awesome sounding dish!$h#$b#I'll ask for the recipe later.#$b#But first, do you think Alexis would take me seriously if I challenged her to the strength game? I do know how to swing...#$b#I've been meaning to challenge her!$h
Entries.Philip: Earlier, Alexis and I challenged each other to the strength game, and I won!$h#$b#Between you and me, though, it has less to do with strength and more to do with posture and ergonomics.#$b#Then I used the money I won to buy a new comic book! Isn't it cool?$h
